attributes.action: Give President Donald J Trump an honorary Knighthood for services to freedom.
attributes.additional_details: A plethora of evidence daily in the mainstream media.
attributes.background: When what would be protected under the First Ammendment in the USA is under attack in the rest of the English speaking world, the President’s willingness to put his head above the parapet is laudable and should be encouraged on this side of the Atlantic.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
